Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Isravelin Theerkkadharisigalukku Virodhamaaga Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Thangal Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhaiye Eduththuth Theerkkadharisananchollugiravargalode Nee Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.
3 karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhaavadhu: Thaangal Ondrum Tharisiyaadhirundhum, Thangaludaiya Aaviyin Evudhalaip Pinpatrugira Madhiketta Theerkkadharisigalukku Aiyo!
4 isravele, Un Theerkkadharisigal Vanaandharangalilulla Narigalukku Oppaayirukkiraargal.
5 neengal Karththarudaiya Naalile Yuththaththil Nilainirkumpadikku, Thirappugalil Erinadhumillai; Isravel Vamsaththaarukkaaga Suvarai Adaiththadhumillai.
6 karththar Thangalai Anuppaadhirundhum, Karththar Uraiththaarendru Solli, Avargal Abaththaththaiyum Poikkuriyaiyum Dharisiththu, Kaariyaththai Nirvaagampannalaamendru Nambikkaiyaayirukkiraargal.
7 naan Uraikkaadhirundhum, Neengal Karththar Uraiththaar Endru Sollumpodhu, Abaththamaana Dharisanaiyaith Tharisiththu, Poikkuriyai Sollugireergal Allavaa?

8 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal; Neengal Abaththamaanadhai Solli Poiyaanadhaith Tharisikkirapadiyinaal, Idho, Naan Ungalukku Virodhamaanavar Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

9 abaththamaanadhaith Tharisiththu, Poikkuriyai Sollugira Theerkkadharisigalukku En Kai Virodhamaayirukkum; Avargal En Janaththin Sangaththil Iruppadhumillai; Isravel Vamsaththaarin Attavanaiyil Ezhudhappaduvadhumillai; Isravel Dhesaththukkul Pravesippadhumillai; Appozhudhu Naan Karththaraagiya Aandavarendru Arindhukolveergal.
10 samaadhaanam Illaadhirundhum Samaadhaanamendru Solli, Avargal En Janaththai Mosampokkugiraargal; Oruvan Mansuvarai Vaikkiraan; Idho, Matravargal Saaramillaadha Saandhai Adharkup Poosugiraargal.
11 saaramillaadha Saandhaip Poosugiravargalai Nokki: Adhu Idindhuvizhumendru Sol; Vellamaagap Perugugira Mazhai Peyyum; Magaa Kalmazhaiye, Nee Sorivaai Kodiya Pusalkaatrum Adhaip Pilakkum.
12 idho, Suvar Vizhumpodhu: Neengal Poosina Poochchu Enge Endru Solvaargal Allavaa?

13 aagaiyaal En Ukkiraththile Kodiya Pusalkaatrai Ezhumbi Adikkappannuven; En Kobaththile Vellamaaga Adikkira Mazhaiyum, En Ukkiraththile Nirmoolamaakkaththakka Perunkalmazhaiyum Soriyum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

14 appozhudhu Neengal Saaramillaadha Saandhaip Poosina Suvarai Naan Idiththu, Adhin Asthibaaram Thirandhukidakkumpadi Adhaith Tharaiyile Vizhappannuven; Ulle Irukkira Neengal Nirmoolamaagumpadi Adhu Vizhum; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
15 ippadi Suvarilum Adharku Saaramillaadha Saandhaip Poosinavargalilum Naan En Ukkiraththaith Theerththukkondu: Suvarumillai, Adharku Saandhu Poosinavargalumillai.

16 erusalemaikkuriththuth Theerkkadharisanancholli, Samaadhaanam Illaadhirundhum Samaadhaanam Undendru Dharisanankaangira Isravelin Theerkkadharisigal Illaamarpovaargal Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

17 manupuththirane, Thangaludaiya Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhaiye Eduththu, Theerkkadharisananchollugira Un Janaththin Kumaaraththigalukku Edhiraaga Un Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avargalukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:

18 aaththumaakkalai Vettaiyaadumpadikku Sagala Kaigalukkum Thazhuvanaigalaith Thaiththu, Andhandha Vayadhullavargaludaiya Thalaikkum Thalaiyanaigalai Undu Pannugiravargalukku Aiyo! Neengal En Janaththin Aaththumaakkalai Vettaiyaadi, Avaigalai Ungalukku Uyirode Kaappaatruveergalo?

19 saagaththagaadha Aaththumaakkalaik Kolvadharkum, Uyirode Irukkaththagaadha Aaththumaakkalai Uyirode Kaappaatruvadharkumaaga Neengal Poikku Sevikodukkira En Janaththukkup Poisollugiradhinaale Sila Sirangai Vaarkodhumaikkaagavum Appaththundugalukkaagavum Ennai En Janaththukkulle Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkuveergalo Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

20 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Neengal Aaththumaakkalaip Parakkadikkumpadi Vettaiyaadugira Ungal Thazhuvanaigalukku Virodhamaaga Naan Vandhu, Avaigalai Ungal Buyangalilirundhu Pidungik Kizhiththu, Neengal Parakkadikka Vettaiyaadugira Aaththumaakkalai Naan Vidudhalai Panni,

21 ungal Thalaiyanaigalaik Kizhiththu, En Janaththai Ungal Kaigalukku Neengalaakkividuven; Avargal Ini Vettaiyaadappadumpadi Ungal Kaigalil Iraargal; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.

22 naan Sanjalappaduththaadha Needhimaanin Irudhayaththai Neengal Veenaai Muriyappanninapadiyinaalum, Dhunmaarkkan Than Pollaadha Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbavum Naan Avanai Uyirode Kaakkavun Koodaadhapadikku Neengal Avanudaiya Kaigalaith Thidappaduththinapadiyinaalum,

23 neengal Ini Abaththamaanadhaith Tharisippadhumillai, Saasthiram Paarppadhumillai; Naan En Janaththai Ungal Kaigalukku Neengalaakkividuven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal Endru Sol Endraar.
